task.title: Connect the Humbucker
task.shortdesc: Connecting a humbucker to volume and tone pots.

step.cmd: Solder the black wire to Lug 3 of your designated volume pot.
Solder the white, green, or yellow wire, depending on the type and brand of your humbucker, to the casing of the volume pot.

image.alt: Wiring diagram showing where to connect humbucker wires
